entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 9:13 PM CST Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
